text: Dasmenda (), possibly also known as Dasmendron, was a town of ancient Cappadocia, inhabited through Roman and Byzantine times. Its site is located near Ovacık, Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cappadocia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Niğde Province
title: Dasmenda
